body.p:
This chapter summarizes the menu bar choices of . The first five menu items
File (Alt+F)
View (Alt+V)
Utilities (Alt+U)
Window (Alt+W)
Help (Alt+H)
are visible for all windows.

The following seven menu items are only visible when the translation window is open:
File (Alt+F, this File menu contains different choices than the File menu in the main view)
Edit (Alt+E)
Options (Alt+O)
Cursor (Alt+r)
Translate (Alt+T)
Spellcheck (Alt+p)
Style (Alt+l)
As a prerequisite for the Actions described below, the view of must be set to 'Use Explorer-like tree view'.
